name: sidebar-sections
description: create spaced sections in sidebar with optional headers.

options.label: section 1 top page (page id)
options.tooltip: the uuid of the sidebar page that will be the top of a section -  (the bit after the '/' in the database url, e.g. edbafbd8bb7045cab1408aadaf4edf9d)

options.label: section 1 title (optional)
options.tooltip: a title to appear above the section. leave blank for spacing only
